name: 12 years - VR experience (Windows Demo)
description:
“12 years” is a personal virtual reality project made in Unreal Engine 4 focused on environmental issues: I wanted to create a post-apocalyptic environment, an underwater world stripped of its natural beauty, invaded by plastic and toxic waste, where only a few of  marine creatures survived. Utopically, they have adapted to garbage, making it part of their food chain and body .

Born as a Set Design final thesis at the Albertina Academy of Fine Arts in Turin, it was then screened in a location at Museo del 900, Turin on the occasion of the 900G – DAYS on 11 September 2020.

This is just a demo - a very early development (2019).

- DOWNLOAD INSTRUCTIONS - 

Just download the zip file, and click only on the "Demo.exe" to open.

To navigate, use classic WASD commands.
